title: OnZen
author: OnZen
content: Hello everyone. I'm new in Bitcointalk. Some one tell me to creat topic in Reputation if I face any problem . I don't know how to add profile link like this. I need help someone please help me how to add this type link.. Thank you everyone...

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: You want to copy your profile link? Let me make it easy, beside the post you just posted now, is your username which is clickable. Click on your username beside any post you made and copy the URL.

comments.author: OnZen
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on January 10, 2023, 12:52:44 PMYou want to copy your profile link? Let me make it easy, beside the post you just posted now, is your username which is clickable. Click on that your username beside any post you made and copy the URL. Sir please post photo.It will more helpful for me .

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: OnZen on January 10, 2023, 12:47:56 PMHello everyone. I'm new in Bitcointalk. Some one tell me to creat topic in Reputation if I face any problem . I don't know how to add profile link like this. I need help someone please help me how to add this type link.. Thank you everyone...You mean this?OnZenCode:[url=https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3527025]OnZen[/url]

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: OnZen on January 10, 2023, 12:54:36 PMSir please post photo.It will more helpful for me . Click on your username like this in the picture anytime you want your profile link. Click on your username at the left side of any post you made. You will see your profile URL.Or if you click on 'profile' instead, it will give you this link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profileThen you can add your UID number which is 3527025 to it. Like this: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3527025
